metadata.title: CVE-2021-37146 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An infinite loop in Open Robotics ros_comm XMLRPC server in ROS Melodicthrough 1.4.11 and ROS Noetic through1.15.11 allows remote attackers tocause a Denial of Service in ros_comm via a crafted XMLRPC call.

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
